Localization.Title: Hail, and well met!
Localization.Text:
Welcome to the Early Access Tutorial for The Lord of the Rings: Living Card Game. You are about to play a rough cut of the gameplay tutorial which sets the scene for the first campaign - The Shadow's Reach. 

We will be polishing this tutorial further during our Early Access period, revising the flow, changing narrative beats and dialog, and further improving the experience for the eventual Full Release.
